- Creative and Media Business Alliance (CBMA) 
- Linked Content Coalition (LCC) 
- The Industry Coalition for Data Protection 
- News Media Coalition (NMC)

- European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA)
goals__remit: The European Publishers Council (EPC) is a high level lobby group of Chairmen and Chief Executives of leading European media corporations. Our goal is to protect the freedom of expression in editorial and advertising content and to represent the business interests of EPC members. These span newspapers, magazines, books, journals, online database and internet publishing as well as in many cases interests in private television and radio.
